tag.help: Tag for the deployed repository (timestamp format recommended)
tag.label: Tag

machines.label: Target Machines

checkpoint.help: Enable hot deploy mode with checkpoint (requires CRIU, zero downtime for online repos)
checkpoint.label: Enable Checkpoint

checkpoint.help: Enable hot backup mode with checkpoint (requires CRIU, zero downtime for online repos)
checkpoint.label: Enable Checkpoint

repository_validate.description: Validate repository by running prep, up, health checks, test, and down
repository_validate.name: validate

skip_prep.help: Skip the prep phase if already run recently
skip_prep.label: Skip Prep

timeout.help: Maximum time per function in seconds (default: 300)
timeout.label: Timeout (seconds)

repository_expand.description: Expand repository storage online with zero downtime
repository_expand.name: expand

size.help: New size (e.g., 20G) - must be larger than current size
size.label: New Size

machine_version.name: hello

repository_list.name: list files

from.help: Machine or storage system to list files from
from.label: Source Location

checkpoint.help: Restore containers from checkpoint if available (requires CRIU)
checkpoint.label: Enable Checkpoint Restore

machine_ping.description: Test network connectivity to the machine

repository_template_apply.name: templates

tmpl.help: Select a template to apply to the repository
tmpl.label: Template

from.help: Select the source machine or storage
from.label: Source

sourceType.help: Select whether to pull from a machine or storage
sourceType.label: Source Type

destinationType.help: Select whether to push to a machine or storage
destinationType.label: Destination Type

state.help: Validate repository is online or offline before pushing
state.label: Required State

checkpoint.help: Enable hot backup mode with checkpoint (requires CRIU, zero downtime for online repos)
checkpoint.label: Enable Checkpoint

to.help: Select the destination machine or storage
to.label: Destination

repository_resize.description: Resize repository storage (offline operation - repository must be unmounted)
repository_resize.name: resize

size.help: New size (e.g., 20G) - can be larger or smaller than current size
size.label: New Size

setup.description: Setup operating system with required tools and configurations
setup.name: setup

docker_source.help: How to install Docker (docker-repo = official repository, package-manager = OS packages, snap = snap store, manual = skip)
docker_source.label: Docker Installation Source

install_amd_driver.help: Install AMD GPU drivers (auto = detect GPU first, true = always install, false = skip)
install_amd_driver.label: Install AMD GPU Driver

install_criu.help: Install CRIU for checkpoint/restore support (auto = install if kernel >= 3.11, true = force install, false = skip, manual = user installs)
install_criu.label: Install CRIU

install_nvidia_driver.help: Install NVIDIA GPU drivers (auto = detect GPU first, true = always install, false = skip)
install_nvidia_driver.label: Install NVIDIA GPU Driver

rclone_source.label: Rclone Installation Source

missingRequiredParams: Please fill in all required parameters: {{params}}
priorityHelp: Tasks are processed by priority first, then by age
priorityHighDescription: Allows multiple concurrent high priority tasks. Use for important tasks that need faster processing.
priorityHighestDescription: Submitting a highest priority task will automatically cancel any existing highest priority tasks you have. Use only for urgent critical tasks that need immediate attention.
priorityHighestTimeoutWarning: Best for quick operations like SSH tests, health checks, and status queries. For longer critical tasks, use P2 (tier-based timeout: 2-96 hours).
priorityLowDescription: Standard processing speed. Recommended for most operations and day-to-day tasks.
priorityLowestDescription: Slowest processing speed. Use for batch operations or tasks with no time constraints.
priorityNormalDescription: Faster than standard processing speed. Use for tasks that need quicker processing than normal.
priorityPopoverP1: 33-second timeout. For quick operations like SSH tests, health checks, and status queries. Reserved slots for immediate execution.
priorityPopoverP2: Tier timeout (2-96h). Reserved slots. For important critical tasks.
priorityPopoverP3: Tier timeout (2-96h). Normal slots. For tasks needing faster processing.
priorityPopoverP4: Tier timeout (2-96h). Standard processing for most operations.
priorityPopoverP5: Tier timeout (2-96h). For batch operations with no time constraints.
onlinePushWarningMessage: Pushing a mounted repository while services are running may cause data inconsistencies.
onlinePushLearnMore: Learn more about online vs offline pushes â†’
repositoryWillBePushedOnline: The repository will be pushed in online state (mounted).
repositoryWillBePushedOffline: The repository will be pushed in offline state (unmounted).
